Program Information.Duration: 1 to 3 semesters depending on studentâ€™s goals
Program Information.Starting Months: February, April, June, August, October, December
Program Information.Domestic Tuition: There are no fees. This program is funded by Employment Ontario through the Ministry of Labour, Training and Skills Development (MLTSD).

CHOICES.Description: Join our free week-long CHOICES class, offered at St. James Campus.

MSAP.Description: Take our free three-week Mature Student Assessment Preparation class.

U-LEVEL.Description: Register for our Degree Bridging (U-level) courses.
U-LEVEL.Additional Information: These courses are accepted by George Brown College and Curriculum Services Canada as U-level equivalent courses for entrance to George Brown degree programs (courses currently not accepted for entrance to Ryerson BScN program).

ACE Distance.Description: Want to upgrade for post-secondary or apprenticeships online? ACE level classes in math, sciences, computers and communications are available online through our ACE Distance Program.

DAUP.Description: Are you Deaf or hard of hearing? George Brown also offers Academic Upgrading for Deaf and hard-of-hearing adults.
